name: Bird Game (Prototype)
description:
Bird Game (Prototype)

This is a prototype project based on the following gameplay elevator pitch:

This game is a fast-paced platformer that encourages players to complete levels as fast as possible. You can fly, and diving onto enemies and obstacles will grant the player additional speed. Difficulty is determined by how quickly players choose to navigate through the levels, and quicker completion results in better rewards.

The game is available on Windows and Mac; please try it out and let me know what you think. It is very short, but I am interested in hearing if the concept has potential, suggestions on improving the gameplay, as well as performance on your computer (lag, framerate, scaling issues, etc).
